title: Consumption-led health cover turns hottest category: Report reveals top insurance trends of 2025
description: Health insurance plans are typically seen as a safety net that comes into use only during hospitalisation. However, this phenomenon has undergone a sea change in 2025, according to a Policybazaar report.
